resources.string:
You cannot run the game at the moment, because some data files of the original game are missing.

Please put the contents of the directory with the original Heroes of Might and Magic II game (or just ANIM, DATA, MAPS and MUSIC folders) into a ZIP archive, copy it to this device, press the "Extract HoMM2 assets" button and select this ZIP archive.

If you do not have a copy of the original game, you can download a ZIP archive of the demo version. Once the download is complete please press the "Extract HoMM2 assets" button and select the newly downloaded demo archive.
Choose the ZIP file with HoMM2 assets
Operation completed successfully, but no HoMM2 assets were found.
An error occurred during the operation: %s
